Text:
This version has pops and clicks as does the other 320 version here. This one http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5080425/Porcupine_Tree_-_The_Incident_(2009)_(without_clicks) appears clean.

Can't wait to see them next week here in Seattle!

This version doesn't have only clicks but the first track of the second disc has the four tracks of the cd in this order : 04 - 01 - 02 - 03
Flicker should be only 3:42 long.
I advise everyone the flac version then convert it tho mp3 if you like or buy ;)
It's a great album by the way !

Bad version, loads of clicks (Not too bad but still a bit irritating)
and as said earlier, failure on Flicker. It's a lot shorter, this version contains all the other songs on the disc for some reason.
There's a better version wich it says "(Without clicks)" on that works just fine.
that is totally digital distortion, please remove this torrent.  Audiophiles will almost pay you to.
